simplified: NASA is trying to find and record some of the smaller asteroids. These asteroids are 140 meters wide or bigger. There are about 25,000 of these asteroids, and so far, they have found and recorded around 8,000. That means there are still 17,000 missing. A smaller asteroid exploded over Russia in 2013, and it hurt 1,200 people. This shows that these middle-sized asteroids could be dangerous if they come close to Earth.

Complex Document: Now NASA is working towards logging some of the smaller asteroids, those measuring 140 metres wide or more. Of the 25,000 estimated asteroids of this size, so far about 8,000 have been logged, leaving 17,000 unaccounted for. Considering that a 19-metre asteroid that exploded above the city of Chelyabinsk in Russia in 2013 injured 1,200 people, these middle-sized asteroids would be a serious danger if they enter Earth's orbit.
Simplified Document:
raw_model_output: NASA is trying to find and record some of the smaller asteroids. These asteroids are 140 meters wide or bigger. There are about 25,000 of these asteroids, and so far, they have found and recorded around 8,000. That means there are still 17,000 missing. A smaller asteroid exploded over Russia in 2013, and it hurt 1,200 people. This shows that these middle-sized asteroids could be dangerous if they come close to Earth.

simplified: The Hunger Games happen every year. The Capitol, which is the main city, uses these games to show the other districts that they are being punished for fighting against them in the past. Everyone in the country watches the games on television.

simplified: Some rocks in space, called Potentially Hazardous Asteroids, come close to Earth. NASA has made a map of 1,400 of these rocks. Scientists don’t think any of them will hit Earth for the next 100 years. NASA can track these rocks with today’s technology and predict if they might cause problems. If there is a risk, they could launch two ways to protect us.

Complex Document: Potentially Hazardous Asteroids' are rocks close enough to pass within 7.5 million kilometres of Earth's orbit. NASA has created a map of 1,400 PHAs, none of which are expected to be a threat in the next one hundred years. With technology already available, NASA can track these objects and make predictions about possible impact, at which point two defence solutions could be launched.

simplified: The book “The Life of Pi” is a fantastic story about a young Indian boy named Pi. He gets into a terrible shipwreck and ends up on a small boat in the Pacific Ocean. On the boat, he shares the space with a dangerous tiger! This book was written by a Canadian author called Yann Martel and published in 2001. It’s been very popular – over seven million people have bought it around the world. It has also won many awards and has been translated into 41 different languages. Yann Martel’s father was a diplomat, and he moved around a lot as a child, living in countries like Costa Rica, Canada, France, and Mexico.

Complex Document: The Life of Pi tells the extraordinary story of Pi, a teenage boy from India, who is shipwrecked and finds himself trapped in a lifeboat in the Pacific Ocean with a ferocious tiger. Since then, it has sold over seven million copies worldwide, won several prizes and been translated into 41 languages. Martel is the son of a diplomat and as a child lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France and Mexico.

simplified: I used to work for five days a week. When I finished my time off with my children after they were born, I wanted to spend more time with them before they started school. I talked to my boss, and we agreed to work only three days a week. This meant I would earn less money because I’m paid based on the number of days I work. However, I’ve found that I’m actually doing the same amount of work as before, but I’m paid much less for it!
full_prompt:
Please simplify the following Complex Document to make it easier to read and understand by A2 CEFR level English learners. Complex Document: I used to do a typical five-day week, but after I came out of my parental leave, I decided that I wanted to spend more time with my children before they start school. After negotiating with my boss, we decided to cut my working week down to a three-day work week. This of course meant a significant cut in my pay too, as I'm paid on a pro-rata basis. I've since noticed, though, that my workload hasn't decreased in the slightest! I'm now doing five days' worth of work in three days, but getting paid much less for it! 
Simplified Document:
raw_model_output: I used to work for five days a week. When I finished my time off with my children after they were born, I wanted to spend more time with them before they started school. I talked to my boss, and we agreed to work only three days a week. This meant I would earn less money because I’m paid based on the number of days I work. However, I’ve found that I’m actually doing the same amount of work as before, but I’m paid much less for it!

simplified: Today, many businesses work with people in different countries. Most business people around the world use English, but the way people communicate can be different depending on their culture. If you don't understand how people from other cultures behave in business, it can lead to mistakes, misunderstandings, and problems. Here are three important differences in business customs that can help you when working with someone from a different country.

Complex Document: Much of today's business is conducted across international borders, and while the majority of the global business community might share the use of English as a common language, the nuances and expectations of business communication might differ greatly from culture to culture. A lack of understanding of the cultural norms and practices of our business acquaintances can result in unfair judgements, misunderstandings and breakdowns in communication. simplified: Some big supermarkets have faced criticism in the last ten years for doing some bad things. They have thrown away a lot of food, paid their suppliers too little money, and created too much plastic waste in their packaging. This has hurt the environment. However, supermarkets are now paying attention to these problems. Because people are angry about all the plastic waste, some of the biggest supermarkets in the UK have made a promise. They will change their packaging and reduce the amount of plastic they use.

Complex Document: Many of the major supermarket chains have come under fire with accusations of various unethical acts over the past decade. They've wasted tonnes of food, they've underpaid their suppliers and they've contributed to excessive plastic waste in their packaging, which has had its impact on our environment. But supermarkets and grocers are starting to sit up and take notice. In response to growing consumer backlash against the huge amounts of plastic waste generated by plastic packaging, some of the largest UK supermarkets have signed up to a pact promising to transform packaging and cut plastic wastage.

simplified: Wasfia Nazreen first saw a hula hoop when she was a child. She saw a girl from another country playing with it in Bangladesh. At that time, in Bangladesh, it was thought that girls shouldn’t play with hula hoops or ride bikes. Now, Wasfia is a very special person. She has climbed the highest mountains in the world, like Mount Everest and Mount Kilimanjaro. She is the first person to hula-hoop on top of each of these mountains. She does this to encourage girls and women in Bangladesh to play sports, because in her country, it’s not common for girls to play sports.

Complex Document: Wasfia Nazreen first came across a hula hoop as a young girl, when she saw a foreign child who was visiting her native Bangladesh playing with one. Wasfia reluctantly stood by and watched, as in her country it was believed that girls should not play with hula hoops or ride bikes. Now Wasfia is one of the few people in the world to have climbed the Seven Summits, including Everest and Kilimanjaro, and the first to have hula-hooped on each peak. Her reason for doing so: to empower women and girls in a country which discourages them from doing sport.

She does this to encourage girls and women in Bangladesh to play sports, because in her country, it’s not common for girls to play sports.

simplified: We think Girox Foods should focus more on its workers. This means looking at ways to let employees have more flexible working times, like starting and finishing work at different hours. Also, we should think about letting employees work from where they want. Managers should try to encourage their staff and give them praise for good work. It would also be good to help employees develop their skills, especially in understanding and working with people from different cultures. This could help create a better place for everyone to do their best work.

Complex Document: On the basis of these findings, we recommend that Girox Foods adopt a more people-oriented management style. As part of this, we should explore ways of offering more flexible working hours to our employees and consider how we can enable employees to work from their chosen locations. Managers need to consider a variety of ways to challenge our staff and provide more positive reinforcement and recognition of the work they do. Increased investment in professional development, especially in the area of social and intercultural communication, could also contribute to creating a positive environment for employees to produce their best work.

It would also be good to help employees develop their skills, especially in understanding and working with people from different cultures. This could help create a better place for everyone to do their best work.

simplified: Over the last 200 years, new technology and better healthcare helped fewer babies die young. This meant more people were born, and families often had many children. However, in the 1960s, it became easier for people to use birth control. Because of this, the average number of babies a woman has in her life has gone down from six to about two.
full_prompt:
Please simplify the following Complex Document to make it easier to read and understand by A2 CEFR level English learners. To simplify, you may replace difficult words with simpler ones, elaborate, or remove them when possible. You may also break down a lengthy sentence into shorter, clear sentences. Ensure the revised sentence is grammatically correct, fluent, and maintains the core message of the original without changing its meaning. Reply only with the simplified text, and nothing else.
Complex Document: In the last two centuries, improvements in technology and health meant fewer children died young, fuelling rapid population growth. These large families produced even more children who survived into adulthood and had their own children. But with the wider availability of contraception in the 1960s, the global average number of babies per woman has declined from six babies per woman to as low as two.
Simplified Document:
raw_model_output: Over the last 200 years, new technology and better healthcare helped fewer babies die young. This meant more people were born, and families often had many children. However, in the 1960s, it became easier for people to use birth control. Because of this, the average number of babies a woman has in her life has gone down from six to about two.

simplified: Understanding that people might have different ideas about what is normal and how they behave can help us avoid misunderstandings. However, it’s important to remember that making assumptions about people based on their country can be harmful to building good business relationships. People’s behavior is influenced by many things, such as where they come from, their friends, their age, their gender, the company they work for, and their own experiences. So, it’s best to keep these differences in mind, but not to judge individuals based on their nationality.

Complex Document: Having an increased awareness of the possible differences in expectations and behaviour can help us avoid cases of miscommunication, but it is vital that we also remember that cultural stereotypes can be detrimental to building good business relationships. Although national cultures could play a part in shaping the way we behave and think, we are also largely influenced by the region we come from, the communities we associate with, our age and gender, our corporate culture and our individual experiences of the world. The knowledge of the potential differences should therefore be something we keep at the back of our minds, rather than something that we use to pigeonhole the individuals of an entire nation.

simplified: Scientists are studying how genes affect the way our brains develop and how we learn to speak. They have found a special gene that changed a long time ago, about 200,000 to 100,000 years ago. This gene seems to help us with speaking and controlling our mouths and faces. Monkeys have a similar gene, but it didn’t change in the same way. We don’t know yet exactly how much genes affect language, but maybe we will find the answers in our DNA someday.

Complex Document: More questions lie in looking at the influence of genetics on brain and language development. Are there genes that mutated and gave us language ability? Researchers have found a gene mutation that occurred between 200,000 and 100,000 years ago, which seems to have a connection with speaking and how our brains control our mouths and face. Monkeys have a similar gene, but it did not undergo this mutation. It's too early to say how much influence genes have on language, but one day the answers might be found in our DNA.

full_prompt:
Please simplify the following Complex Document to make it easier to read and understand by B1 CEFR level English learners. To simplify, you may replace difficult words with simpler ones, elaborate, or remove them when possible. You may also break down a lengthy sentence into shorter, clear sentences. Ensure the revised sentence is grammatically correct, fluent, and maintains the core message of the original without changing its meaning. Reply only with the simplified text, and nothing else.
Complex Document: Julie Wong is a leading researcher in the field of Robotics and AI. She has been published extensively as author and co-author of over 50 papers in highly regarded, peer-reviewed journals. She frequently speaks at international conferences and was awarded the prestigious Royal Academy Simone Fielding fellowship in 2012. Julie lives with her family in a smart home she designed herself.
Simplified Document:
raw_model_output: Julie Wong is a well-known scientist who studies robots and artificial intelligence. She has written many articles with other scientists, more than 50 in important journals. She often talks at meetings around the world and received a special award from the Royal Academy in 2012. Julie also lives in a house she designed herself, and it’s a smart home.
